com.epoch.chem.chemConstants

Interface FormulaConstants

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Formula, FormulaFunctions, HasFormula

    public interface FormulaConstants
    Holds constants used in Formula.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ALLOW_ASTERISK
      Bit 1 of flag for constructors and parseFormulaStr.
      static char ANY_NUMBER_IN_FORMULA
      Symbol to denote any number (zero or more) in chemical formula.
      static String ANY_NUMBER_REGEX
      Symbol to denote any number (zero or more) in chemical formula, for use in regular expressions.
      static int FIX_CASE
      Bit 0 of flag for constructors and parseFormulaStr.
      static int KEEP_CASE
      Opposite of bit 0 of flag for constructors and parseFormulaStr.

    • Field Detail

      • ANY_NUMBER_IN_FORMULA

        static final char ANY_NUMBER_IN_FORMULA
        Symbol to denote any number (zero or more) in chemical formula. NOTE: Don't change it, as this value may already be part of database entries.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ANY_NUMBER_REGEX

        static final String ANY_NUMBER_REGEX
        Symbol to denote any number (zero or more) in chemical formula, for use in regular expressions.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FIX_CASE

        static final int FIX_CASE
        Bit 0 of flag for constructors and parseFormulaStr.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • KEEP_CASE

        static final int KEEP_CASE
        Opposite of bit 0 of flag for constructors and parseFormulaStr.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ALLOW_ASTERISK

        static final int ALLOW_ASTERISK
        Bit 1 of flag for constructors and parseFormulaStr.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
